mapper.select:
select count(1) from np_third_store_info where del_flag ='0' and is_supplier='0' and
company_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyName}),'%') and
store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{storeName}),'%') and
check_status ='1' and is_submit = '1' and
check_status ='0' and is_submit = '1' and
1=1

select
from np_third_store_info where del_flag ='0' and is_supplier='0' and
company_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyName}),'%') and
store_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{storeName}),'%') and
check_status ='1' and is_submit = '1' and
check_status ='0' and is_submit = '1' and
1=1 order by mod_time desc limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select count(1) from np_third_store_info info,np_collection_seller seller where info.store_id = seller.collection_third_id and info.check_status = '1' and info.del_flag != '1' and seller.collection_del_flag = '0' and seller.collection_customer_id = #{collectionCustomerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select store_id, customerId, store_balance,store_street_sort,store_street_is_show,is_choice from np_third_store_info where store_id=#{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: UPDATE np_third_store_info SET store_street_sort = #{set_tore}, store_street_is_show = #{is_Show}, is_choice = #{isChoice} WHERE store_id = #{storeId}
update np_third_store_info set expiry_time = #{expiryTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from np_third_store_info where store_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and (SYSDATE() BETWEEN mod_time and expiry_time)
select count(1) FROM np_mob_home_page WHERE isthird = '1' AND store_id = #{thirdId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
